body:
Do you guys like view bobbing on or off?

I personally like it on,but I want to see what you guys think,and please tell us why!

Id like to see at least 3 big comments with no grammar mistakes! Lol
body_tagged:
Do you guys like view bobbing on or off?

I personally like it on,but I want to see what you guys think,and please tell us why!

Id like to see at least 3 big comments with no grammar mistakes! Lol
title: View bobbing.On or off?

replies.body: I usually play with view bobbing off. Also, you failed your own challenge by not inserting an apostrophe in "I'd".
replies.body_tagged: I usually play with view bobbing off. Also, you failed your own challenge by not inserting an apostrophe in "I'd".

replies.body:
I was expecting my auto correct to do it for me,I'm currently on a mobile device xD

Anyways,DON'T JUDGE ME,I RITE WATEVAR I WANT XDDD

Back to topic, why do you like it off?
replies.body_tagged:
I was expecting my auto correct to do it for me,I'm currently on a mobile device xD

Anyways,DON'T JUDGE ME,I RITE WATEVAR I WANT XDDD

Back to topic, why do you like it off?

replies.body: I prefer bobbing to be off because I feel I'm more accurate while jumping, shooting, and hitting. I also set my FOV to QuakePro.
replies.body_tagged: I prefer bobbing to be off because I feel I'm more accurate while jumping, shooting, and hitting. I also set my FOV to QuakePro.

replies.body: I prefer on, just because it feels more natural.
replies.body_tagged: I prefer on, just because it feels more natural.

replies.body: It gives me smoother gameplay, and also, because I ninja bridge a lot, it tends to shift my view side to side, which can really mess with my bridging accuracy.
replies.body_tagged: It gives me smoother gameplay, and also, because I ninja bridge a lot, it tends to shift my view side to side, which can really mess with my bridging accuracy.

So, I like it off.

replies.body: I used to have it on but turned it off recently and I have noticed (for me) that it makes my hitting more accurate.

replies.body: I turned it off like all of mah settings for optimal fps (4 fps ftw)

replies.body: I have turned it off as it slightly lowers my fps

replies.body:
I play MC with the view bobbing in "on", but "off" helps your aim a lot.
I can head ez head-twitchs using the view bobbing in "off".
replies.body_tagged:
I play MC with the view bobbing in "on", but "off" helps your aim a lot.
I can head ez head-twitchs using the view bobbing in "off".

replies.body: I keep the bobbing effect off, mostly because it distracts me from PVP, and it annoys me alot when sprinting xD
replies.body_tagged: I keep the bobbing effect off, mostly because it distracts me from PVP, and it annoys me alot when sprinting xD
